ingredients.ingredient: 4 ounces Chihuahua cheese, sliced into strips
10 large shrimp, peeled and deveined, or more to taste
10 slices smoked bacon, or more to taste

cookingTips: Wrap bacon around shrimp with cheese for secure packages that hold together
Don't overcook shrimp; they need only a few minutes per side
The coffee liqueur caramelizes and adds subtle depth to the savory dish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a sophisticated appetizer combining sweet, savory, and rich flavors. Guide users on wrapping techniques, cooking bacon to proper crispness, and how the coffee liqueur complement rather than overpowers the other ingredients.
